mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: 500 MB video memory
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: May not work on Apple Silicon; 16:9 aspect ratio
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: 2 GB video memory
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: May not work on Apple Silicon; 16:9 aspect ratio

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: 500 MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 aspect ratio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: 2 GB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 aspect ratio
